finance.title: Finance
finance.body: Dedicated to discussions on finance, investment strategies, and market trends, providing insights for both beginners and seasoned investors.

healthcare.title: HealthCare
healthcare.body: A platform for healthcare professionals and enthusiasts to discuss the latest in medical advancements, healthcare policies, and patient care.

technology.title: Technology
technology.body: Focuses on the latest technological innovations, software development, and tech industry trends, fostering a community of tech enthusiasts.

education.title: Education
education.body: A hub for educators, students, and lifelong learners to exchange ideas on teaching methods, e-learning, and educational theories.

retail.title: Retail & Sales
retail.body: Discusses retail management, sales strategies, customer service, and the evolving landscape of brick-and-mortar and online retail.
